channel.title: Recording in 1-bit boolean arrays instead of 8/16/32 bit ints?
channel.description:
I was wondering if it's possible to make boolean arrays of 1-bit values instead of 8,16 or 32 bit integers? I've just made an audio to PWM converter and want to use the smallest bitsize possible for recording to enable the longest possible recording size..
oh, that was easier then I thought haha... it's just called bool instead of boolean... like "bool array[8];" XD
